long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This plugin is to be used with GitLab merge requests. You can add the usernames and save (saves locally on your browser) then just click to select them and it will open Gitlab search dropdown and start selecting them one by one. 

I was tired of manually selecting each user one by one, so maybe this also solves the problem for you.
